name: Cobblemon:Mega Showdown
description:
Adding mega evolutions, z-moves, teralization, dynamax, ultra burst and fusions to the game
Features
- Cosmetics
- All form changes
- Ridding supported
- All 48 megas
- Accessories support
- Adds primal's
- Adds tera gimmik
- Adds mega gimmik
- Adds z moves gimmik
- Adds dynamax gimmik
- Adds ultra burst gimmik
- All fusion mons
